name: Water Bender Alpha
description:
In this game you play the role of a cabbage thieve. After pulling of your first big cabbage heist in the Water Nation your resuming your thievery in the Earth Nation. Though it may seem quite easy to steal cabbages it is not as easy as it seems. After being placed a high bounty by the leaders of the Water nation for your crimes, the dai-li and other earthbenders will soon come after you wanting the reward. Will you be able to pull through and not get caught or will you fail...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Move - WASD

Jump -  Space

Crouch - Q/Right Click

Shoot - Left Click

Use -  E
